DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy orlistat 60 mg adjuvant treatment Obesity adult .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Orlistat Adjuvant Treatment Obesity Adults
DOC.criteria: Signed Informed Consent ; Adults Male Female ≥ 18 year old ; Obesity ( BMI ≥ 30kg/m2 ≥ 27 Kg/m2 associate risk ) ; Pregnancy Lactation woman without effective contraception ; Relevant clinical disease ; Obesity associate genetic syndrome ; Decompensated Diabetes ; Psychiatric disorder ; Alimentary disorder ; Use : anorectic , herbal weight loss and/or constipation laxative , past 30 day ; Patients use cyclosporine amiodarone ; Patients bowel disease ; Prior bariatric surgery ; Anemia ; Hemoglobinopathies coagulopathy ; History cancer past five year ; Use corticosteroid , oral injectable , last 30 day .
